person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Boutros-Ghali on Wednesday opened the door for other Africans to contest his job by saying he was suspending temporarily his candidacy but was not withdrawing completely from the race .

2. Boutros-Ghali is a person's name.
3. Therefore, "Boutros-Ghali" is a "Person" entity in the paragraph.

Additionally, it is worth noting that the paragraph mentions "his job" and "his race" in reference to Boutros-Ghali. These pronouns also refer to Boutros-Ghali, further confirming that he is the person being referred to in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
